clinical_history: Patient with neurological deficits referred for brain PET-CT.
findings: Diffuse mild increased uptake in liver, likely benign.
Multiple hypermetabolic lesions in bones, suggestive of metastases.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in bone marrow, suggestive of malignancy.
Physiologic brown fat uptake in supraclavicular region.
recommendations: Consider lab tests to assess metabolic activity if indicated.
